title: How will Eric Schmidt's departure from the CEO role affect Google? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think the better question is what does he know that we don't. He sold a bunch of shares and steps down. There could be more to the story then meets the eye. It is likely that Larry Page will bring in more innovation. Google is bleeding talent to other companies. That will be interesting to see how they make themselves relevant in their tech recruiting.
